summary: All three logo-removal requirements appear to be implemented: header and footer brand areas are text-only with a Home-scroll control retained, and the favicon reference is removed from frontend/index.html. The diff also includes unrelated metadata/state file updates that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata in project_state.json (feature request entries AR-1..AR-4, statuses, etc.), which is not part of removing logo imagery/favicon references.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for removing header/footer logo imagery and favicon reference; it did not request changes to project state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/generated repository summary content in frontend-file-summaries.txt.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to summary/documentation files; scope was limited to removing logo imagery/favicon references.
